TopicTitle: [WIP][1.9.x-1.12.x] Scatterer-atmospheric scattering (0.0838 - 14/08/2022) Scattering improvements, in-game atmo generation and multi-sun support

Spectra needs an update to run with new Scatterer

I've not tried Dx11 just yet, but on the latest scatterer (054) I got the white sky bug again:

Using the DLL you sent earlier for 2 days of career playing, I had not received this bug since, but after installing the latest scatterer (054) I got it on my second launch.

![kZzAIfl.png](https://i.imgur.com/kZzAIfl.png)

![SHYnUXg.png](https://i.imgur.com/SHYnUXg.png)

> 
> 
> 1 hour ago, Gameslinx said:
> 
> 
> I've not tried Dx11 just yet, but on the latest scatterer (054) I got the white sky bug again:
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Using the DLL you sent earlier for 2 days of career playing, I had not received this bug since, but after installing the latest scatterer (054) I got it on my second launch.
> 

Upon closer inspection of your log file, I see this error

    [LOG 10:21:40.599] [Scatterer] Multiple config files detected, check your install

I see you have these config files

    [LOG 10:21:48.346] Config(Scatterer_config) scatterer/config/config/Scatterer_config
    [LOG 10:21:48.341] Config(Scatterer_config) BeyondHome/scatterer/config/config/Scatterer_config

Shouldn't you have only one or the other? Shouldn't you have a ModuleManager patch overriding the stock one if that's what you want for your mod? Try deleting one of them.

Although I'm not sure this is the cause, there were times before were people with duplicate installs had white sky, worth a try.

Can you retest with the previous .dll also, this would be weird as the fix is still there in the new version.

> 
> 
> 20 hours ago, Errol said:
> 
> 
> Downloaded that and am using it now, it's great. Noticing that it doesn't seem to work with parts that have the new stock texture switching (many of the rocket fuel tanks)....any suggestions on how to fix that?
> 

That's probably because it's from the days before the new parts.

Search for their \*.mu files in the Squad folder and add their paths in the ModuleManager patch you are using.

What is the correct order to install <abbr title="Environmental Visual Enhancement (mod)">EVE</abbr>, Scatterer, and Stock Visual Enhancements, along with which mods' config files should I load? I like to use <abbr title="Comprehensive Kerbal Archive Network (a KSP mod manager)">CKAN</abbr>, but can do manual method if needed to get the mods to work correctly. I'm currently using all but Scatterer, since with Scatterer I get a black sky and ocean in the <abbr title="Kerbal Space Center">KSC</abbr> scene and during the vehicle launch screen.

A quick FYI for anyone trying these TU configs, it may wind up blocking visibility out of the cockpit / IVA mode. Ooops. Looks really gorgeous on the outside, though. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

[@blackrack](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/104258-blackrack/) -- this scatterer release looks absolutely gorgeous. Hi, [@blackrack](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/104258-blackrack/)

I had some time, to test latest release more carefully - I still get scatterer effects overlayed on ships, but now it lasts only for a while - on altitudes between 90 and 110 km. Same recreation steps (clean 1.6.1 install with sigma diemnsions set to 6.4 and scatterer). Anyway, now it disappears without scene reload, so I can live with it ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

Hey [@blackrack](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/104258-blackrack/) It’s been a long while. Just spun up a new 1.6.1 game last night. And I just had to drop by and say.

- Fantastic work! Each time I think you’ve really gone and “finished” Scatterer. You just keep making it better! KSP wouldn’t be the same without ya man! Thanks.

Hey, I hate to pile on but I think I might have a new variant of this bug everyone's having. The thrust reverser on the goliath engine triggers a rebuild of the ocean for me. My log specifically mentions its drag cube which sounds an awful lot like the mk2 lander can bug mentioned elsewhere in the thread.

ok, I'm glad it wasn't something I did.  Looks like I'm having the same SVE incompatibility issue.

I also noticed that when I reloaded the cache, it fixed the sky, but I got a black bar on the bottom of the screen.

I'll rollback to a previous Scatterer build for now.  What is the last stable build for SVE?

[@blackrack](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/104258-blackrack/) amazing work, once again. Many many thanks.

Mod works just as advertised for me here.

One quick question though: i was always using Galileos FlareReplacer alongside Scatterer with no issues. Now it overrides that flare. And when I disable Scatterers flare in the Scatterer menu, I get no flare at all. Even though FlareReplacer is still installed, and it worked fine before the Scatterer update too.

Any idea how to keep the flare from FlareReplacer and still run the beautiful Scatterer???

Here are the flares in question btw, works off of Kopernicus as far as I understand

thanks in advance!
